interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Operation.EnergyUsage
interface.description: Interface that exposes information on Power and Energy consumption of the device.

property.name: CurrentPower
property.description: The instantaneous power consumption of the device in W. 7fff ffff ffff ffff (NaN) indicates an unknown value.

property.name: CumulativeEnergy
property.description: The cumlative power consumption of the device in kWHr. 7fff ffff ffff ffff (NaN) indicates an unknown value.

method.name: ResetCumulativeEnergy
method.description: Resets the value of CumulativeEnergy to 0
